Title: Should Vinted, Temu or Amazon really be regulated like pornographic platforms?
Subhead: By applying legislation designed for adult websites to online marketplaces, the government is fighting the wrong battle, unless the goal is to ban the entire internet for minors.

Title: Nicolas Guillou, French ICC judge sanctioned by the US: 'You are effectively blacklisted by much of the world's banking system'

COP30 presents an existential issue for Indigenous peoples
Subhead: The global climate conference was meant to be a moment of recognition for Indigenous peoples, who have been placed at the heart of President Lula's political agenda. Yet, faced with the Brazilian president's contradictions, Indigenous activists have come to the fore, determined to make their voices heard at a summit that directly affects them.

Title: The mysterious relocation of more than 150 Palestinians from Gaza to South Africa

Title: 'Worthy of Game of Thrones': The EU Commission's battle for control of diplomacy
